name: Basic Reinforcement
description: An instinctual use of ki. You are capable of infusing your body with ki, enhancing your physical stats. This will cause a constant drain on your reserves. Cast again to cancel it.

name: Iron Scale
description: By shaping the ki into a tough, physical membrane around you, you can mimic the scales of a snake, increasing the defense of your body.

name: Meditation
description: Ponder upon the lessons learned while using your ki.

name: Wood Shedding
description: Shed the outer layer of skin by turning it into a healing bark.
